content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. I'm not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I'll try to get the highest price possible. Let's start with a high number to see where it goes. I want 1000 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a high price for an unfurnished apartment in Magdeburg. I'm a student and I'm looking for a more affordable option.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand that, but the location of the apartment is in the city center, which is close to all important facilities. I can see that you're a student, so let's say 800 euros per month. I'm sure you'll appreciate the convenience of the location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high for me. I was hoping for something around 500 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 500 euros per month is too low for this apartment. However, I can see that you're a student and you need a more affordable option. Let's meet in the middle at 650 euros per month. It's a great deal for an apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation. I appreciate it. However, 650 euros is still a bit high for me. I was hoping for something around 550 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, but 550 euros per month is too low for this apartment. I'll consider your situation and meet you halfway. Let's say 600 euros per month. It's a great deal for an apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation. I appreciate it. 600 euros per month sounds like a good deal, and I'm willing to rent the apartment for that price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [600] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
